txt.en: Spear-heads and spear-shafts have been hidden all over Bhol Rûdh.\n\nYou should collect spear-heads and spear-shafts.

'I am Dhôm-dhuga-Nôkh. I make spears for our warriors. Used for hunting animals and now for hunting gorgûn. \n\n'Village children took my spear-heads and shafts, hid them. No time to find them, many spears to make. Will you help? Gather spear-heads and shafts, assemble spears, place on racks.'
Dhôm-dhuga-Nôkh examines the spears you assembled. She looks pleasantly surprised.\n\n'Good! You must be skilled fighter.'
Spear-racks can be found in Bhol Rûdh, next to Dhôm-dhuga-Nôkh.\n\nYou should assemble spears and place them on the spear-racks.
Dhôm-dhuga-Nôkh can be found in Bhol Rûdh.\n\nYou should talk to Dhôm-dhuga-Nôkh.
Dhôm-dhuga-Nôkh, a villager of the Red Sky Clan, has asked for your help assembling spears for the attack on Kala-gijak.
